name: Decode "What Does My Girl Say?" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who played the suspicious girlfriend in the "SNL" video "What Does My Girl Say?"
questions.explanation:
Kerry Washington.

	On Kerry Washington's night to host "Saturday Night Live", the only skit that wasn't done live was the parody of "What Does The Fox Say?" by the band Ylvis. Jay Pharoah played the boyfriend in the parody "What Does My Girl Say?"

questions.text: As the boyfriend's grandmother was going down the steps in "What Does My Girl Say?", what body part did she yell out that she had hurt?
questions.explanation:
Hip.

	The boyfriend's cousin wanted money, his uncle wanted to sleep, and his mother wanted a kiss.

questions.text: What animal did the suspicious girlfriend say one of the girls on his computer looked like in "What Does My Girl Say"?
questions.explanation:
Horse.

	Kerry Washington as the suspicious girlfriend called one of the women on the computer a horse. In the video, the woman in question stood next to a horse and they both neighed.

questions.text: What was the first line the girlfriend sang to her boyfriend in the video "What Does My Girl Say?"
options: She didn't sing anything at all
questions.explanation:
"Yanh, Yanh, Yanh, Yanh, Yanh, Yanh".

	The first thing the suspicious girlfriend sang was "Yanh, Yanh, Yanh, Yanh, Yanh, Yanh". She sang that word eighteen times in the video while flapping her hands at her boyfriend.

questions.text: What made the girlfriend suspicious of her boyfriend in the beginning of "What Does My Girl Say?"
questions.correct: He received a text from another woman
options: He received a text from another woman
He was caught with another woman
He was staring at another woman's butt
He called his girlfriend by another woman's name
questions.explanation:
He received a text from another woman.

	Kerry Washington's boyfriend in the video was sitting with her on the couch watching the video for "What Does The Fox Say?" when a text came through from a woman named Sasha Club wanting the boyfriend to know she was thinking about him.

questions.text: Who did the boyfriend say paid for his cellphone in the video "What Does My Girl Say?"
questions.explanation:
His suspicious girlfriend.

	Before his suspicious girlfriend left the apartment, the boyfriend reminded her that she was the one that paid for the cellphone that started all the problems.

questions.text: At the boyfriend's family gathering in "What Does My Girl Say?", what did the boyfriend say his grandfather smelled in the video?
questions.explanation:
Gas.

	In the video, the boyfriend's grandmother said, "Oh, my hip" and the boyfriend's grandfather smelled gas.

questions.text: In answer to all of the questions the boyfriend's suspicious girlfriend asked him in "What Does My Girl Say?", what was his first answer?
questions.explanation:
"I don't know".

	His answer to her questions was "I don't... I don't... I don't know."

questions.text: When the suspicious girlfriend checked icloud.com on her boyfriend's computer, what pictures did she find on "What Does My Girl Say?"
questions.explanation:
Women's butts.

	When Kerry Washington as the suspicious girlfriend checked her boyfriend's icloud account, she found fifteen pictures of women's butts in their underwear.

questions.text: How did the "What Does My Girl Say?" video end?
questions.correct: The suspicious girlfriend left her boyfriend
options: The suspicious girlfriend was seen texting with an unknown man
The suspicious girlfriend walked off with the boyfriend's cousin
The suspicious girlfriend threw the boyfriend out of his own apartment
questions.explanation:
The suspicious girlfriend left her boyfriend.

	The video ended with the suspicious girlfriend telling her boyfriend she didn't need him and then walking out.
